https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1cUP5kJ7GuerBbU0irKQwijtuYa.jpg A father tries to rekindle his relationship with his son after years of absence and lack of communication. He takes him on a car ride across northern Norway, hoping it is not too late. Bright Nights
